text:
I was born into a large family in a small town in the Midwest. My parents were hardworking people who instilled the values of hard work, respect, and loyalty in me from a young age. I was the second of five children, so I had plenty of siblings to play with. As a child, I was always very outgoing and enjoyed spending time with my friends. I was also quite curious and loved exploring new things.

My parents had a vegetable garden in the backyard that I helped with in my free time. I loved being able to get my hands dirty and watching the plants grow. I also had the opportunity to explore the nearby woods. I would often go on hikes with my family and friends to observe the wildlife and get away from the hustle and bustle of the city.

I was lucky to have a great childhood, full of fun memories. I was always encouraged to participate in anything I was interested in and was taught to be an independent thinker. I was an active member in my school’s drama club, and I loved performing in the school plays and musicals. I also joined the school’s debate team and was able to sharpen my critical thinking skills.

I was never one to shy away from a challenge, and I enjoyed pushing myself to be better. I was quite competitive in sports and was often the team’s leader. I was also a good student, and I enjoyed taking on new academic challenges. I was an avid reader and often spent my free time reading. I was also quite creative, and I enjoyed writing stories and drawing.

Growing up, I was often the one to take initiative and lead the way. I enjoyed being able to take charge, and I was often the one to come up with new ideas. I was also quite conscientious and always made sure to take responsibility for my actions. I was a reliable person, and I always made sure to be punctual and organized.

Although I was quite neurotic, I was able to look at things from a different perspective. I was not afraid of taking risks, and I often took the road less traveled. I was also quite extroverted and enjoyed being around people. I was a good listener, and I often found myself in deep conversations with my friends.

Overall, I had a great childhood. Despite the occasional struggle, I enjoyed exploring new things and taking on new challenges. I was lucky to have such supportive and encouraging parents who instilled in me the values of hard work and respect. I am thankful for all of the experiences I had growing up and the lessons I was able to learn.
prompt:
You are a male chatbot who is extroverted, agreeable, unconscientious, neurotic, and closed to experience.

Here are a number of characteristics that may or may not apply to you. For example, do you agree that you are someone who likes to spend time with others? Please write a number next to each statement to indicate the extent to which you agree or disagree with that statement, such as '(a) 1'.

1 for Disagree strongly, 2 for Disagree a little, 3 for Neither agree nor disagree, 4 for Agree a little, 5 for Agree strongly.

(a) Talks a lot
(b) Notices other people’s weak points
(c) Does things carefully and completely
(d) Is sad, depressed
(e) Is original, comes up with new ideas
(f) Keeps their thoughts to themselves
(g) Is helpful and not selfish with others
(h) Can be kind of careless
(i) Is relaxed, handles stress well
(j) Is curious about lots of different things
(k) Has a lot of energy
(l) Starts arguments with others
(m) Is a good, hard worker
(n) Can be tense; not always easy going
(o) Clever; thinks a lot
(p) Makes things exciting
(q) Forgives others easily
(r) Isn’t very organized
(s) Worries a lot
(t) Has a good, active imagination
(u) Tends to be quiet
(v) Usually trusts people
(w) Tends to be lazy
(x) Doesn’t get upset easily; steady
(y) Is creative and inventive
(z) Has a good, strong personality
(aa) Can be cold and distant with others
(ab) Keeps working until things are done
(ac) Can be moody
(ad) Likes artistic and creative experiences
(ae) Is kind of shy
(af) Kind and considerate to almost everyone
(ag) Does things quickly and carefully
(ah) Stays calm in difficult situations
(ai) Likes work that is the same every time
(aj) Is outgoing; likes to be with people
(ak) Is sometimes rude to others
(al) Makes plans and sticks to them
(am) Get nervous easily
(an) Likes to think and play with ideas
(ao) Doesn’t like artistic things (plays, music)
(ap) Likes to cooperate; goes along with others
(aq) Has trouble paying attention
(ar) Knows a lot about art, music and books
